alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cullman County through 945 PM CDT... At 915 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nesmith, or 10 miles west of Cullman, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hanceville, Good Hope, Dodge City, Baldwin, West Point, Garden City, Colony, Phelan and Walter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Alabama.
